dc_description_s: Mounted cover title. Copperplate print. In Japanese. Oriented with north to the upper right. Relief shown by hachures. Includes 6 insets, address chart and distance chart. Includes preface and legend. Includes list of mileage, rivers and district names. 1 map; 106 x 145 cm., folded in cover 25 x 19 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
